com.rift.coad.lib.security
Class ThreadsPermissionContainerAccessor

java.lang.Object
  com.rift.coad.lib.security.ThreadsPermissionContainerAccessor

public class ThreadsPermissionContainerAccessor
extends java.lang.Object

This object supplies access to the thread permission container.
